segments.text: I ’ ll sing you a song .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sing a song . But don ’ t sing a sad song .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Most of my songs are sad , sorry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , please sing one that ’ s not sad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I ’ ll sing San Francisco then .
segments.speaker: S1
